titleStmt.title: Some dialogues between Mr. G. and others with reflections upon a book called Pax vobis.
titleStmt.author: Lynford, Thomas, 1650-1724.
Griffith, Evan, A.M., Minister of Alderly. Pax vobis.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Randall Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Thomas Lynford.
Running title: Reflections upon Pax vobis.

Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
